Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: everyone We have updated KMDICE to the newest komodo daemon with sapling activated and @jl777c has fixed some performance issues that had been bugging us since some time ago. We want to give it a broad public test to see if it is working better now. If any of the testers could help on doing bets today it would greatly help us know if the changes and the update is working as expected.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: please, update your daemons to latest FSM branch for better results

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content:
```#!/bin/bash 

while true; do
    sleep 2
    echo "KMDICE"

    cd ~/komodo/src
    getinfo=$(./komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE getinfo)
    balance=$(echo $getinfo | jq -r '.balance')
    echo 'Wallet balance:' $balance
    entropy=$(./komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE diceinfo 5be49570c56d036abb08b6d084da93a8a86f58fc48db4a1086be95540d752d6f)
    entropytx=$(echo $entropy | jq -r '.entropytxs')
    echo 'Entropy txs available:' $entropytx
    bet=$(./komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE dicebet KMDICE 5be49570c56d036abb08b6d084da93a8a86f58fc48db4a1086be95540d752d6f  $1 $2)
    bet_hex=$(echo $bet | jq -r '.hex')
    bet_txid=$(./komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE sendrawtransaction $bet_hex)
    echo $bet_txid
    echo $bet_txid >> ~/bets.txt
        echo "$bet_txid" > ~/bettxid.txt
    echo "Waiting bet tx to confirm"
    sleep 10
    bet_status=$(komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE dicestatus KMDICE 5be49570c56d036abb08b6d084da93a8a86f58fc48db4a1086be95540d752d6f $bet_txid)
    betStatus_result=$(echo $bet_status | jq -r '.status')
    betAmount_result=$(echo $bet_status | jq -r '.won')
    if [ "$betAmount_result" != "null" ]; then figlet $betAmount_result
    fi
    echo $betStatus_result
    echo $betStatus_result >> ~/bets.txt
done

```

Content: you can try this script to get a loop of bets

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content:
@SHossain you can also then use this script to get stats of the resutls: ```#!/bin/bash

loss=$(tr ' ' '\n' < ~/bets.txt | grep loss | wc -l)
win=$(tr ' ' '\n' < ~/bets.txt | grep win | wc -l)
null=$(tr ' ' '\n' < ~/bets.txt | grep null | wc -l)
betstillpending=$(cat ~/bets.txt | grep "bet still pending" | wc -l)
total=$(wc -l < ~/bets.txt)
totalbets=$(echo ''$total' / 2' | bc)

echo 'Wins:' $win
echo 'Losses:' $loss
echo 'Bets still pending:' $betstillpending
echo 'Nulls:' $null
echo 'Total bets': $totalbets
```
